医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
个性化短信可有效促进心血管事件后增加体力活动锻炼是降低患心脏病或心脏病或中风等第二次心血管事件风险的最佳方法之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Personalized-text-messages- effectively-promote-increased-physical-activity-after-cardioangio-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Personalized-text-messages- effectively-promote-increased-physical-activity-after-cardioangio-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c106b4d8-7e9d-4606-b22e-fcfad739286c Wed, 24 Jul 2024 12:56:12 -0400 Personalized text messages effectively promote increased physical activity after cardiovascular events
ActiveHip+ 促进老年髋部骨折患者的康复该数字解决方案是由格拉纳达大学 (UGR) 和安达卢西亚卫生服务中心 (SAS) 领导的欧洲项目的一部分开发的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/ActiveHip2b-enhances-recovery-for-elderly-hip-fracture-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/ActiveHip2b-enhances-recovery-for-elderly-hip-fracture-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbba7bef-22d7-41fa-bda3-932fe38fc5a9 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 12:48:00 -0400 ActiveHip+ enhances recovery for elderly hip fracture patients
LGBTIQ+ 和顺性别异性恋者在有争议的运动中表现出更多的压力荷尔蒙瑞士 2021 年全国婚姻平等公投运动如何影响 LGBTIQ+ 群体的福祉？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/LGBTIQ2b-and-cisgender-heteromale-individuals-exhibit-more-stress-hormones-during-controversial-campaign.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/LGBTIQ2b-and-cisgender-heteromale-individuals-exhibit-more-stress-hormones-during-controversial-campaign.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfc4573b-17d7-4eb9-8aa3-2ded3fcc2bfa Wed, 24 Jul 2024 12:45:06 -0400 LGBTIQ+ and cisgender heterosexual individuals exhibit more stress hormones during controversial campaign
揭示大自然的猎人：Skylar Johnson 博士对婆罗洲热带雨林吸光度 96 和 1 的食虫猪笼草的研究在这次采访中，斯凯拉·约翰逊博士分享了她对婆罗洲茂密雨林中的食肉猪笼草的惊心动魄的冒险和开创性的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Unveiling-naturee28099s-hunters-Dr-Skylar-Johnsons-research-on-carnivorous-pitcher-plants-with-Absorbance-96-One-in-Borneos-雨林.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Unveiling-naturee28099s-hunters-Dr-Skylar-Johnsons-research-on-carnivorous-pitcher-plants-with-Absorbance-96-One-in-Borneos-雨林.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=772529fc-8810-409f-aa1b-6ad0dd146612 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 11:19:00 -0400 Unveiling nature’s hunters: Dr. Skylar Johnson's research on carnivorous pitcher plants with Absorbance 96 & One in Borneo's rainforests
研究揭示皮肤细菌在关节手术后慢性骨感染中的作用在接受过膝关节或髋关节置换手术的个体中，临床医生注意到越来越多的慢性骨感染与皮肤上常见的细菌菌株有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Study-reveals-skin-bacterias-role-in-chronic-bone-infections-after-joint-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Study-reveals-skin-bacterias-role-in-chronic-bone-infections-after-joint-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b986165c-78d2-4e0b-a5da-6d90593279ee Wed, 24 Jul 2024 10:51:08 -0400 Study reveals skin bacteria's role in chronic bone infections after joint surgery
慢性和新的焦虑与痴呆风险增加有关在《美国老年医学会杂志》上发表的一项研究表明，慢性焦虑和新发焦虑都与痴呆风险增加有关。然而，如果焦虑得到解决，则与痴呆风险无关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Chronic-and-new-anxiety-tied-to-increased-dementia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Chronic-and-new-anxiety-tied-to-increased-dementia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=052b8082-0363-4e2d-82ec-255050d96cb9 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 09:15:11 -0400 Chronic and new anxiety tied to increased dementia risk
A4 研究的综合数据集提供了有关阿尔茨海默病的重要见解无症状阿尔茨海默病抗淀粉样蛋白治疗 (A4) 研究是针对症状前阿尔茨海默病的第一个也是最大的临床试验，其数据现已广泛提供给研究该疾病的研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Compressive-dataset-from-A4-study-yields-key-insights-about-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Compressive-dataset-from-A4-study-yields-key-insights-about-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da7f6119-4164-4f14-8c31-51ed46160890 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 07:55:48 -0400 Comprehensive dataset from A4 study yields key insights about Alzheimer's disease
用双效大环酮挑战抗生素耐药性伊利诺伊大学芝加哥分校的最新研究表明，一种通过破坏两种不同细胞靶点发挥作用的新型抗生素将使细菌产生耐药性的难度提高一亿倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Dual-Action-Antibiotic-Could-Make-Bacterial-Resistance-Nearly-Impossible.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Dual-Action-Antibiotic-Could-Make-Bacterial-Resistance-Nearly-Impossible.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed643ce2-f36e-46af-ada1-52ec72c3bf4f Wed, 24 Jul 2024 07:50:00 -0400 Challenging antibiotic resistance with dual-action macrolones
沃特世新型快速筛选-DSC 可在超低样品量下将抗体药物的热稳定性测试速度加快 24 倍沃特世公司今天宣布在全球发布专为生物制药开发商设计的 TA Instruments™ 快速筛选差示扫描量热仪 (TA Instruments RS-DSC)。 TA Instruments RS-DSC 是一款高通量 DSC，用于专门针对抗体药物和工程蛋白进行高浓度生物制剂的精确热稳定性测试https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Waters-new-Rapid-Screening-DSC-enables-up-to-24x-faster-Thermal-stability-testing-at-ultra-low-sample-抗体药物卷.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/Waters-new-Rapid-Screening-DSC-enables-up-to-24x-faster-Thermal-stability-testing-at-ultra-low-sample-抗体药物卷.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c44c638d-e8b6-4430-ade1-b3cbccd4ec04 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 07:36:00 -0400 Waters new Rapid Screening-DSC enables up to 24x faster thermal stability testing at ultra-low sample volumes for antibody drugs
世界著名的墙药也未能幸免于乡村药店面临的挑战史黛西·舒尔茨 (Stacey Schulz) 将车停在后方停车场，以避免前往当地药房的拥挤的主街入口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/World-known-wall-drug-isne28099t-immune-from-challenges-faceing-rural-pharmacies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240724/World-known-wall-drug-isne28099t-immune-from-challenges-faceing-rural-pharmacies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b531c87-32f9-4786-940a-8c957f36301a Wed, 24 Jul 2024 07:13:33 -0400 World-famous wall drug isn’t immune from challenges facing rural pharmacies
